item.title: Radity Finance - UI Kit
item.description: We have been receiving a lot of requests for a Finance Kit recently due to the popularity of Fintech.

item.title: Robo Advisor
item.description: Robo Advisor is a Swiss Wealth Manager and wants to create the best digital experience for its UNHW clients across the world. We started with a whiteboard.

item.title: Swiss Fintech Website
item.description: The Swiss Finance + Technology Association is the leading FinTech hub in Switzerland.

item.title: Sample blog content 3
item.description:
Sample blog content. Like a lorem ipsum but saying something more interesting.

Welcome to the world of “Content Ipsum,” the fresh alternative to the classic lorem ipsum. It’s the perfect blend for designers and writers who crave a dash of creativity and meaning in their placeholder text. Imagine a text that not only fills the space but also sparks the imagination, a text that weaves tales of innovation, inspiration, and the endless possibilities that creativity brings.

item.title: Job #3
item.description:
Fixing the world, one byte at a time

Hostile takeover - who is the boss now!

item.title: Juninor Typesetter
item.description:
Student at work

As newbie in publisher industry, I work 4 hours a day. My job was:

  • Preparing newspaper pages in ps-files for printing
  • Control quality of product

item.title: Typesetter
item.description:
First job

The beginning of a career.

I work on several projects as typsetter for enduser manuals for publisher “Buka”. Booklets for games.

Some of my projects:

  • FarCry
  • Echelon
  • Echelon 2
  • Petka i Vasiliy Ianovich
